Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

keyholder 0.1.62021-12-04

  • Reaction to dplyr 1.0.8.

keyholder 0.1.52020-05-09

  • Reaction to dplyr 1.0.0.

keyholder 0.1.42020-03-01

  • Reaction to tibble 3.0.0.

keyholder 0.1.32018-12-01

  • Reaction to tibble 2.0.0: ease some tests and adjust to deprecated functionality.

keyholder 0.1.22018-05-19

  • Reaction to dplyr 0.7.5: ease some tests and fix bugs in methods for dplyr generics.

keyholder 0.1.12017-11-13

  • Create pkgdown site.
  • Implement scoped (*_all, *_if, *_at) functions key_by_*, remove_keys_*, restore_keys_* and rename_keys_*.

keyholder 0.1.0

  • Implement core package functionality: set, get and manipulate keys; methods for utility and subset functions, dplyr one- and two-table verbs.
  • Add a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.
